text: Creed Taylor (May 13, 1929 â€“ August 23, 2022) was an American record producer. He was best known for his work with CTI Records, which he founded in 1967. He also worked for Bethlehem Records, ABC-Paramount Records (including its jazz label, Impulse!), Verve, and A&M; Records. Taylor died on August 23, 2022, at the age of 93.Creed Taylor, Jazz Giant And Impulse!
